generator.group: Monash Institute of Cognitive and Clinical Neurosciences, Monash University

contact.group: Monash Institute of Cognitive and Clinical Neurosciences

publications.title: Generation of four iPSC lines from peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) of an attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) individual and a healthy sibling in an Australia-Caucasian family

genomic_characterisation.summary: G-banding of iPSCs was carried out at the Monash Pathology Services (Monash Medical Centre). A total of 15 cells were analysed; 5 banded cells were analysed for metaphases spread and 10 cells were examined for chromosome analysis.
